Institute of Radioelectronics and Multimedia Technology

head.citation-title: Relationship between the cayley–dickson fourier transform and the hartley transform of multidimensional real signals
head.abstracts: © 2017 IEEE.The paper shows relations between two different frequency representations of n–dimensional signals (n = 1, 2, 3): the Cayley-Dickson Fourier transform and the Hartley transform. The formulas relating the n–D complex Fourier transform and the n–D Hartley transform are presented. New formulas relating the Quaternion and Octonion Fourier transforms and respectively the 2–D and 3–D Hartley transforms are developed. The paper is illustrated with examples of Hartley transforms of 1-D, 2-D and 3–D Gaussian signals.
